alert.note: Alert for Clermont; Clinton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:56AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN CLERMONT, NORTHWESTERN BROWN, SOUTHERN WARREN, SOUTHWESTERN CLINTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM EDT... At 555 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Morrow, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mason, Lebanon, Loveland, Milford, Blanchester, Mount Orab, Williamsburg, Batavia, Morrow, Kings Island, Camp Dennison, South Lebanon, Woodville, Maineville, Owensville, Goshen, Newtonsville, Fayetteville, Midland, and Butlerville. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 24 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
